number_of_waves.description: The number of waves this component will spawn.

start_time_between_waves.description: The start time between then one wave ends and the next one starts.

end_time_between_waves.description: The end time between then one wave ends and the next one starts.

maximum_time_between_waves.description: If a wave has been completely cleared, then we enforce this maximum time between waves.

start_encounter_points_multipliers.description: A multiplier relative to the base encounter points for the current difficulty.

end_encounter_points_multipliers.description: A multiplier relative to the base encounter points for the current difficulty.

boss_frequency.description: Sets the frequency of when bosses spawn, for example ever 5:th wave if set to 5.

target_unit.description: [unit]If set, encounter will have their target position to a unit of this type in the level.
